creditline: Given in memory of Ted Hartwell
description: man wearing a mask over his eyes, dressed in sheer sequined short dress, holding sheer shawl behind him with outstretched arms, emerging from a giant clown's mouth
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, and Edition

on back, URC, in black ink: [SS TOLD 2c]
signed: on back at bottom edge, in pencil: [Standard Deviation: Fun House N.Y.C.  5/10  Toby Old 1981]
title: Fun House, NYC, from "Standard Deviation, Disco" series
